rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall that welcomes guests and provides a buffer between the exterior and interior.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and views.

rooms.name: Contemporary Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with ample storage and integrated appliances. Open plan connects to the living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom providing privacy and comfort with a focus on natural lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom designed for occasional use, ensuring good energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom (attached to Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom with proper ventilation and privacy, ensuring optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: Main entrance door designed for ease of access and to channel positive energy.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling balcony window offering panoramic views and enhanced natural light.

design_principles.vastu_guidelines: Aligned with Vastu principles ensuring optimal energy flow, especially in living and sleeping areas.

additional_features.duplex_structure: Two levels, designed to optimize space on a 100x100 feet plot.
additional_features.modern_materials: Use of sustainable and locally sourced materials.
